* [Michalak, E. M., et al. (2019). "The roles of DNA, RNA and histone methylation in ageing and cancer." Nature Reviews: Molecular Cell Biology 20(10): 573-589.](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41580-019-0143-1)
* [Feinberg, A. P. (2018). "The Key Role of Epigenetics in Human Disease Prevention and Mitigation." N Engl J Med 378(14): 1323-1334.](http://www.nejm.org/doi/10.1056/NEJMra1402513)
